valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 4 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Trafalgar 988 slow-moving east, filling 992 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly or northeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 until later. In east, northerly or northeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first, veering easterly 3 to 5 later.
Sea state
In west, very rough becoming rough later. in east, moderate or rough.
Weather
In west, squally snow showers. In east, squally snow showers.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally very poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
03:40 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026
Northerly gale force 8 continuing
Viking.wind: In west, northerly or northeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 until later. In east, northerly or northeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first, veering easterly 3 to 5 later.
Viking.sea_state: In west, very rough becoming rough later. in east, moderate or rough.
Viking.weather: In west, squally snow showers. In east, squally snow showers.
Viking.visibility: In west, good, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally very poor.
